spec_data.Name: perl-Tk-ColoredButton
spec_data.Description:
Tk::ColoredButton is an extension of the Tk::Canvas::GradientColor
widget. It is an easy way to simulate a button widget with gradient
background color.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:52:47 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Button widget with background gradient color
